thread.title: Jamie Carragher trolls Everton on social media ahead of the Merseyside derby
thread.title_full: Jamie Carragher trolls Everton on social media ahead of the Merseyside derby

author: Jon Moody
title: Jamie Carragher trolls Everton on social media ahead of the Merseyside derby
text:
Jamie Carragher trolls Everton on social media ahead of the Merseyside derby The legendary Liverpool defender was never going to miss the opportunity to get a little dig in Share Carragher knows how to wind up certain fans on social media (Photo: AFP) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
In case you weren't already aware, the small matter of the Merseyside derby is fast approaching on the Premier League horizon. 
Liverpool host Everton in Saturday's early game and the build-up to it is getting louder and louder. 
Reds keeper Simon Mignolet wants to keep up his impressive derby record , while Ronald Koeman has vowed the Toffees will provide a "big challenge" at Anfield. 
Everyone on each side of the divide is trying to get one up on the other where they can - and that includes a certain Jamie Carragher. Look at that cheeky little grin... (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) 
Liverpool's legendary Champions League-winning defender has taken to his Instagram to have a little dig at the blue side of the city. 
In a #ThrowbackThursday (or should that #TrollbackThursday? Sorry...) post, Carragher shared a picture of him passionately celebrating on the Goodison Park pitch as Liverpool secured another three points at the home of their biggest rivals. 
Take a look: 
Unsurprisingly, reaction to the post from users was split between people either calling him a "legend" or words we're not really allowed to say before the watershed. 
It's well known that Carra was a boyhood Everton fan and that hasn't stopped fans being split on his true allegiances before. 
But his latest post may serve as a reminder to some ahead of the crunch game... poll loading Who will win the Merseyside derby? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
